bibl.title: The Chronological Systems of Byzantine Egypt.

series.title: Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia.

bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S. and Klaas A. Worp, The Chronological Systems of Byzantine Egypt. (Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia. VIII.)

C.R. par John R. Rea, JEA 70 (1984) pp. 187-189. - J.-M. Carrié, BASP 18 (1981) pp. 183-188. - G. Husson, REG 95 (1982) pp. 486-488. - W. Eck, BibO 39 (1982) coll. 107-109. - B.E. Klakowicz, StPap 19 (1980) pp. 68-72. - Ad. Lukaszewicz, Przeglad Historyczny 70 (1979) pp. 570-571.
